name: Unwelcome Visitors
description:
Unwelcome Visitors is a top-down twin-stick shooter where you and a friend are tasked to terraform a planet by the Alien Queen. But first, you just need to get rid of some pesky inhabitants standing in your way. 

Play as either Mur who is equipped with the ability to shoot fire and blow out radiation or Dur who can shoot intense winds and explosive sludge. Combine these abilities with your partner and the effects will multiply in strength.

These include: Napalm bomb your enemies, introduce them to the wonders of a chain radiation storm, use a mesmerizing but destructive fire tornado and if you feel like the dang humanoids are giving you some trouble, get yourself a powerful shield. All these abilities are yours to play around with in Unwelcome Visitors!!!

Unwelcome Visitors are made by:

Product owner & Game design
 Erik Slfversparre 

Game design, Technical art, and Scrum Master 
Hinrik Gylfason 

Narrative & Level Design
